messages.content: The election in York Outer is between the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats.

I take polls seriously, having earned my living by cutting through the spin to see what the data really says. I set up Britain's first political betting website in 2004 and have spent the past 15 years analysing what voters are saying.
When looking at the recent election polls one thing is clear - this General Election is going to be a memorable one.

mentions.tacticalSituation: From the analysis I've done, the data gives us a good idea of the choice people face on Thursday 12th December - Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.

politicalExperience.achievements: Set up Britain's first political betting website in 2004

quotes.text: I'm not here to tell you who to vote for, but I hope this information is useful to you when making a decision in this election.

examples: Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
I set up Britain's first political betting website in 2004.
When looking at the recent election polls one thing is clear - this General Election is going to be a memorable one.
The election in York Outer is between the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats.
Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
Whether the Conservative or the Liberal Democrat wins will come down to how many Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: The election in York Outer is between the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats.
